oracle.dmt.jdm
Class OraMiningTask

java.lang.Object
  oracle.dmt.jdm.OraMiningTask

public class OraMiningTask
extends java.lang.Object

javax.datamining.MiningTask enumeration defines the JDM standard task types as list of enumerated values. This class declares Oracle data mining task extensions as MiningTask enumerated values and adds them to the MiningTask as extension enumerated values. Oracle JDM implementation defines new tasks that are not defined in JDM 1.1 standard. They are :

  • transformation task -- used to perform data transformations
  • predictive analytics tasks -- simplified data mining opeartions that automate the data mining processes, hide complexities such as transformations, attribute selection and produces the final results.
    • predict task -- outputs prediction results by taking an input table name and the column name for which predictions to be made.
    • explain task -- outputs importance values of columns in the given input table that based on the correlations with the given explain column.
    • profile task -- outputs the profiles of the cases that are mined from the given input data with respect to the specified target attribute values.
Since:
OJDM 11.1.0
